member.name: M:ParasolBackEnd.Controllers.KrsController.GetCategories
member.summary: Returns the list of supported category phrases.

member.name: M:ParasolBackEnd.Controllers.KrsController.GetEntities(System.String[],System.String[])
member.summary: Returns KRS entities optionally filtered by KRS numbers and/or categories.
member.param: Optional list of KRS numbers to include.
Optional list of categories to match against activity descriptions.

member.name: M:ParasolBackEnd.Controllers.KrsController.GetNames(System.String,System.String[])
member.summary: Returns only organization names for a given category or set of categories.
member.param: Multiple categories to match. Use repeated query parameters.
